description:
Chaika and company have arrived in a town ruled by Duke Gavarni, who is said to own some of Emperor Gaz`s remains. The area is rich in fossilized magic fuel production, but all the shops they visit are low in stock. It turns out the Duke is taking most of the fuel, as well as the girls of the town.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La forteresse voguant dans le ciel
